mapper.update: UPDATE message SET is_read = true WHERE msg_type = 'notice'
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, sender_type AS senderType, sender_id AS senderId, receiver_type AS receiverType, msg_type AS msgType, is_application AS isApplication, app_status AS appStatus, admin_remark AS adminRemark, is_read AS isRead, create_time AS createTime FROM message WHERE receiver_type = #{receiverType} AND receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND msg_type = 'notice' ORDER BY create_time DESC
